item.description:
Thought this was a cool event to check out over the long weekend. Their audience tends to be in the 21-40 y/o professional crowd. The cover is $10 w/RSVP according to a promoter I talked to. The meetup time is 4pm; you can get there as early as 3pm. I'll RSVPÂ  for everyone signed up as of Saturday.


***
PREMIER EVENTS
PRESENTS

THE LAUNCH OF DAYDREAM
"THE PREMIER DAY PARTY SERIES"
HOSTED BY MYA

MEMORIAL DAY SUNDAY
MAY 26TH 3P-7P

NAGA LOUNGE & PATIO (INDOOR/OUTDOOR PARTY)
450 MASS AVE. CENTRAL SQ. CAMBRIDGE, MA

MUSIC BY DJ PLAYTIME & DJ RADIO P
TOP 40 | R&B | 90'S | HIP HOP CLASSICS | INT'L
item.how_to_find_us: A meeting spot will be posted in the comments
